name: World Super Bike Championship
description:
WSBC TIPS:

- Get coins to earn extra bonus
- Complete every mission before time
- Make laps and racing tracks selections
- Choose your favorite racing bike simulator
- Customize and upgrade moto racing bikes


WSBC Leauges:

- Knockout
- Time Trial
- Bike Attack
- Quick Race
- WBSC Bike Championship


Game Play Controls:

- Tilt
- Buttons


Key Features:

- HD Graphics
- F1 track racing
- Fast music sounds
- Multiple traffic racers
- 3D Superbike Championships
- Plenty of world class traffic riders and moto riders
- Plenty of heavy bikes, tricky bikes, moto bikes to choose
